name: Paradoxe Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Neroli Bud, White Amber, White Musk.Fragrance Description:This is a floral, ambery perfume that reinvents freshness with a neroli bud extraction to capture the flower’s fresh scent, sensuality with bio-converted amber to reveal a vibrant warmth, and intensity through a revolutionary musk molecule for an intense yet subtle trail..About the Bottle:This refillable perfume bottle reinvents the most iconic code of the Prada brand: its triangle logo. Tilted yet powerfully grounded, the radical shape of the bottle is softened by rounded edges while the coral-pink color of the fragrance contrasts with the black cap and Prada coat of arms. The perfume bottles have been designed to limit use of glass and the boxes are FSC™ MIX certified, ensuring a sustainable choice of paper and paperboard. The entire Prada Paradoxe range is refillable, allowing for less packaging material. A single 50 mL bottle of Prada Paradoxe and a 100 mL refill uses 40 percent less materials in total versus three 50 mL bottles. This includes 29 percent of glass, 67 percent of metals, 46 percent of plastics, and 39 percent of cardboard..About the Fragrance:This feminine, floral perfume for women is an invitation to explore and express the paradoxical multidimensions of women. Experience the celebration of self-expression and the liberation that comes with being never the same, always yourself.
ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Limonene, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Methyl Anthranilate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Farnesol, Benzyl Benzoate, CI 17200/Red 33.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_text: I have really been enjoying Prada Paradoxe. The fragrance is such a nice, balanced warm floral as I typically don’t go for most floral scents. However, the amber and musk really help tone down the florals for me personally. I also really love the packaging, the bottle design is fun yet mature and stands apart in my collection. I had tried this product before in smaller sets and had it on my list to purchase either a larger travel spray or full size so I was excited to receive this. The downside is that I find this perfume to not be as long lasting as I would expect from a luxury brand. I would say it lasts about five hours and then you could use a refresh, which is a bummer as I have many perfumes that last all day for me. I would recommend this perfume primarily in the travel sizes for this reason so you can always have it near. I did receive this item free from influenster in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Today I am reviewing the latest addition to Prada's fragrance line, the Paradoxe Intense, which I got from Influenster. This new rendition elevates the beloved original to new heights, maintaining its iconic triangular flacon while intensifying the scent's complexity and allure.  Prada Paradoxe Intense elevates the original scent to new heights with intensified floral, warm, and woody notes. The Jasmine superinfusion, Ambrofix accord, and bold Moss base create a captivating, sensual fragrance. It boasts impressive sillage and projection, making a bold statement. While the deeper, edgier character may risk overindulgence, the meticulous craftsmanship shines through. This fragrance is a must-try for those who appreciate a daring yet familiar scent, perfect for leaving a lasting impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Scent Complexity: PARADOXE by Prada is a wonderfully complex fragrance. It starts with a burst of vibrant citrus that quickly gives way to a sophisticated floral heart. As the day progresses, you'll notice warmer, woody notes emerging, creating a rich, multifaceted experience that keeps evolving. It's the kind of scent that keeps you intrigued, always revealing something new.  *Packaging Design:*   The bottle design of PARADOXE is pure Prada – elegant and modern. Its clean lines and minimalist look are elevated by luxurious details like the gold cap and the subtly engraved Prada logo. It's not just a container for the fragrance; it's a beautiful object you'll be proud to display on your vanity.  *Projection:*   The projection of PARADOXE is impressive. Just a few sprays are enough to make a statement without being overwhelming. It's perfect for leaving a lasting impression, whether you're at a meeting or out for dinner.  *Sillage:*   PARADOXE has a moderate to strong sillage, meaning it leaves a pleasant, lingering trail that draws attention in a good way. It's noticeable but not overpowering, ideal for those who like their presence to be felt without dominating the room.  *Versatility:*   One of the standout qualities of PARADOXE is its versatility. It works for any occasion, from formal events to casual outings. Its complex profile makes it suitable for both day and night, and its sophisticated charm means it fits well in any season. It's a true all-rounder in your fragrance collection.

reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so beautiful. A fresh fruity, powdery scent. Fresh bergamot and tangerine at the top with a hint of a juicy pear. So bright from the citrus notes. The mid features a beautiful sweet slightly gourmand orange blossom note which I have discovered a great love for. A sweet headiness from the jasmine sambac. Then you reach the dry down of that bourbon vanilla, ambery and musky base to balance it, so it's not a syrupy sweet fragrance! This fragrance is delicious and captivating to my nose. A very 'pretty girl' scent. Many call it basic and it is a familiar mainstream scent. But mainstream means loved by hundreds of thousands, so I'll take that over a $300/$400 fragrance that I have to 'grow' to love or let my nose 'mature' to understand!! Fantastic sillage and longevity.

reviews.review_text: This fragrance is indeed a paradoxe to me. It start with a warm dark intoxicating blend of pear, orange and vanilla... just to dry out with a hint of cheap freshness... and that's the point I get reminded that I hate neroli (would have been a wonderful fragrance for me without that note). Overall is a very strong fragrance, for people who want to be noticed; it's quite a neutral fragrance, I can easily see it used by a guy without smelling too feminine. In a way the scent seems a little bit outdated and common, but you get a decent quality with Prada nonetheless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received a sample of Prada Paradoxes Eau de Parfum thanks to Macy's and Popsugar Dabble free of charge so that I may sample the Parfum and in return give my honest review. Prada Paradoxe was created by Nadège Le Garlantezec, Antoine Maisondieu and Shyamala Maisondieu. Prada Paradoxe is an Amber Floral Fragrance for Women and was released in 2022. The perfume bottle is not like any perfume bottle we have seen yet and looks very elegant. It contains The Paradoxe Parfum which is a beautiful Barbie Pink fluid fills up an upside down glass triangle with a bold black rectangular top labeled Prada. The Bottle is also beautifully Branded with the logo Prada Milano in black lettering. Prada did an excellent job designing such a beautiful and sophisticated perfume and bottle. The top notes of Prada Parafoxe are Pear, Tangerine and Bergamot; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Neroli Essence, Neroli and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, White Musk, Amber and Benzoin. Once on your skin you will be left with a sweet amber scent which has a pretty good longevity lasting for 3-5 hours. I believe this perfume could be used as your daily perfume or it could be used for that special occasion. After sampling this perfume my significant other could not stop smelling me and telling how great I smell. I absolutely love this perfume and would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_text: PRADA PARADOXE EAU DE PARFUM is an intriguing and unique fragrance that captivated my senses. In my opinion, it exudes a sense of mystery and sophistication with its blend of floral and woody notes ,while the heart notes of tonka bean and vanilla add warmth and depth. . The initial burst of tuberose and ylang-ylang is intoxicating, while the underlying hints of patchouli and vanilla add depth. However, the longevity could be improved, as it tends to fade relatively quickly. Overall, it's a scent for those who appreciate unconventional fragrances and enjoy making a statement.I absolutely adore PRADA PARADOXE EAU DE PARFUM! It's a versatile scent that's perfect for both daytime wear and special occasions. The sleek, minimalist bottle adds to its overall appeal. Prada paradoxe will be my favourite perfume from now on!

The perfume is very feminine with Amber floral Scent—-with warmer notes of Pear, Tangerine and Bergamot with base notes of Amber and Vanilla. This definitely smells VERY EXPENSIVE which is great for any date or any girl’s night out . The packaging and the bottle is absolutely elegant and classy . All the same, my husband loves it, and I do too! it usually lasts about 6 hours strong, on my skin, but longer on clothes. I find the projection to be medium. People can smell me a foot or two away earlier in the day when I first spray, but it's not hitting you across the room. I was rocking with a travel size, and he got me the 3oz for my birthday. reviews.review_text: I ordered this perfume online after smelling one of those little magazine samples, where it seemed to be floral without being overly sweet, but in-person, it's exactly the opposite. To me, this smells exactly like an old Bath and Bodyworks scent, Forever Sunshine: bright, summery, and extremely sweet. I loved Forever Sunshine in high school, but wearing Paradoxe today, the sweetness feels overpowering. It's also a bit similar to YSL's Libre Intense (which I have and love), but even sweeter and less floral; Paradoxe isn't as rich or deep, and Libre Intense has a honey-ish sweetness whereas this smells more sugary. Overall, I don't like it because I wanted something more subtle, more distinctive, and less sweet, but people who love sugary summertime scents will probably love Paradoxe. In terms of positives, the staying power is amazing, and the bottle is beautiful: unique, heavy, and the spritzer works so well. I wish I loved the perfume half as much as I love the bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This ✨ Prada Paradoxe Perfume ✨ is scentsational! 💅🏽 From packaging to scent, everything about this perfume is phenomenal! The packaging feels like Christmas, and the scent smells and feels luxurious, sweet, and decadent! 🌺  This feminine fragrance embraces the paradoxes of neroli, amber, and musk; while gently enhancing my natural  pheromones. 🌺 🌈 These paradoxes, combined, make such a delicious scent that I can’t stop wearing it and it’s my official Go- To Perfume! 🔥 Here’s what I love about each of these paradoxes: 🔥 🍊 Neroli originates from the aromatic flower blossoms of bitter orange trees (Citrus Aurantium) 🍊, bringing out a citrus and floral tone with an enticing green edge. 🌿 💎 Amber expresses the warm, resinous, sensual, slightly sweet, and exotic paradox of this perfume. 🧡 🌪 Musk expresses the woodsy and earthy scent 🍃 ; combined with the other paradoxes makes a seductive 👄 , succulent desire. 🌹 All I have to say… ✨✨ Prada✨✨ was brilliant with this Prada Paradoxe! 🌺 They came up with a brilliant formula on this one! 💙

reviews.review_title: Must buy if preferred sweet/ soft floral scent !!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I should’ve gotten the bigger size !!!! It’s that good! Perfect by itself or for layering. (30 ml in pic)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great but to me it smells exactly like Lancôme idole (the one with zendaya). Nothing wrong with it. It’s a lovely scent, just strikingly similar to the Lancôme one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good scent. However, it is a very basic and common scent. I will still wear it, but I won't repurchase it.

reviews.review_title: Too intense. Too sweet. Not in my taste.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shock and disappointment. Very vulgar for my taste. Knowing Prada for a cool note in their fragrances I was expecting something lighter and more elegant sense - summer breeze with trace of barriers... But not like this one! It will knock you in a face! Very heavy! Overwhelmingly sweet. And nothing unique (Maby just for Prada?), resembles with lot of others perfume with a blackberry notes, but more intense. Give a 2-star review for a bottle design. And returned the perfume. But some might like it...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I see a lot of people saying this isn’t a unique smell, which I guess is true but the special thing about this perfume is that it actually lasts, I’ve tried all the similar ones in this scent category and they always only last max2 hours on my skin, but this perfume lasts at least 10 hours maybe more. I work in a kitchen and I get compliments all day long about how good I smell and to me that is amazing and I will continue to repurchase this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought but returned. It smells like what you’d get if you combined Valentino Donna Born in Roma with Armani My Way. EXCEPT, I prefer both of those.  This isn’t bad but there are better similar scents out there. This very boring and generic- nothing sets it apart. This scent profile has already been done 10 times over and been…better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love .my new addiction.it’s perfect 😍 😍😍😍😍

reviews.review_title: Absolutely love this new scent by Prada!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first got this perfume I wasn't sure I really liked it. It was different than that fruity perfumes I usually wear. At first when I put it on I felt it was a little stronger than I liked but after about 5 minutes it was real subtle and smelled great. This was my first Prada perfume I have tried and since then it's become my go to scent. Definitely give it a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been working on my fragrance collection. I always wondered why companies don't make refillable bottles because I always feel bad throwing away empty bottles. I was so excited to see that prada paradoxe eau de parfum is refillable!! The fragrance is soft and floral with a hint of sweetness. One spritz lasts a long while and i've had lots of compliments when I wear it. I recommend this for everyday and special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A really lovely fragrance! I usually lean towards deeper/woodier scents but Paradoxe is quite nice! It’s floral and sweet and I see this as a nice daytime perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved it ! It smells amazing, fancy, sexy and last long time! Worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like everything about it from the day it arrived. The packaging is just so pretty the perfume bottle is easy to use. The smell is just wonderful just right no too strong. I used it whenever I’m going out in the city or when I feel like it. No dislike about this perfume. Just get it it’s worth it. Yes I would recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has been my go to since I received it. It’s distinct musk and floral allows you to wear both day and night. It’s the perfect combination of strong warm/musk and floral. I can smell oranges, but it’s also not on your face. It goes on a bit strong, but it kind of fades off and I don’t get a headache from it. My favorite feature it’s that it’s a REFILLABLE bottle!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer neutral or masculine fragrances but this one is nice. Definitely on the fruity side and I can smell the jasmine & floral notes strongly, but it's not like an old lady perfume scent. I wouldn't spend the retail price on it but nice to try!

reviews.review_title: You don’t know until you try it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I smell this fragrance it brings the word timeless to mind, elegant, fresh yet, pungent. I usually am not one for fragrances that have a sweet scent but I think this one is by far my favorite because it has a touch of sweet notes while also having a nice musk to follow it. I am beyond grateful to have tried out this product because I think I’ve found one of my new favorite scents. After doing some more research I love the idea of this fragrance or any fragrance bing refillable, talk about sustainability!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this perfume, but it was a little too floral for me. It wasn’t overpowering and has a long lasting scent. The packaging is also really sleek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it beautiful floral notes is always my favorite cute bottle long lasting refreshing sweet smell if you are fan of floral sweet smells you will love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my review. I am IN LOVE!!! This has quite quickly become my new favorite perfume ! One spray lasts me the entire day, the smell is absolutely incredible and I’ve received nothing but compliments. I highly recommend this and will definitely be buying it again in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this fragrance from Prada. Everything from the packaging to the bottle shape just ooze class and sophistication. The scent is wonderful with musk and floral notes. I love the pink color and the scent lasts all day! This was my first fragrance VoxBox and I hope to get more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells bomb! i literally love spraying this on me because i can’t get enough of this scent! I spray about 3 sprays and it’s not overpowering to where it’s too much. i would definitely recommend this perfume if you were thinking about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has the most luxurious, feminine scent to it and I absolutely love it! You can get hints of sweetness of fruit and a small hint of florals as well! Perfect for a night out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume! It has become my go to scent of the season. It smells gorgeous and luxe! I am obsessed it is so sexy and subtle. Will definitely be purchasing more. I received this perfume in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Perfection in and out of the Bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance! The unique shape of the Bottle with Rose pink perfume. its mixture of sweet, floral and elegance. love that it is NOT Overpowering. i would say the Perfume Itself is a definition of aesthetics!! Perfect for a date night or everyday wear. Also love the fact it can be Refilled. I cant mention how many compliments I have received. luxurious is what i would call it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is so hard to explain a scent that I truly love and this is one of them!  I love more of a woodsy, musk aroma vs fruity.  Anything to sweet and pungent gives me a migraine so I have to be careful when choosing.  The aroma is so light but yet deep and powerful.  It truly changes aroma from person to person.  Our chemistry interacts and changes how it smells on each person.  If you love a musk, woodsy, scent, you will definitely love this.  It only took 1 spritz and it lasted all day.  This is made with oils vs alcohol so you want have to worry about it vanishing after an hour of wear.  Plus its refillable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this scent! The bottle is very unique with the design. I was scared to set it down, but very solid with a different look to add to the counter space. Immediately when I put the perfume I felt sexy wanting to wear this out on a date. Made me feel instantly confident and feminine. This will be a perfume I absolutely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s smells nice , but I’m more of a Tom ford / MFK girl .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feel absolutely feminine + liberated when wearing PRADA PARADOXE in the new refillable fragrance bottle. With fresh florals and subtle notes of musk and amber, you live to feel your absolute self. With sensuality and warmth this fragrance can do from day to night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so good. It’s not overpowering, and it lasts all day. Every time I wear it I have people complimenting me. I had to hide it so my daughters would stay out of it! They love it so much. This is my new favorite perfume. It’s a warm floral scent and I’m not a fan of floral perfumes, but this one is to die for!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this free from influencer. So as soon as I put this on it gave me a headache. I’m not a fan. It’s sweet and turns citrusy at the same time could be the musk. I’m not sure if I’d recommend this. If you’re like me and like vanilla, floral, sweet. This might not be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good every day scents. It’s not too overwhelming or overpowering. The scent lasts and it a nice fresh scent.
